response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I am extending this opportunity to purchase it from me at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value, allowing you to enjoy all the features and advantages of the product at a discounted rate compared to its market value. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 11000}
